Type Property# workoutEffortScore

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
static let workoutEffortScore: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
```
